extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Auto skip ads when watching YouTube videos. Let YouTube no ads!

timesaveInfo.message: VAB-YT nêzîkê tomar kir. $savedTime$ ji jiyana te.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

videoBranding.message: Ji VAB-YT ji hêla Adblock ve hatî paqij kirin

displayVideoBranding.message: Agahdariya dirêjkirinê li jêr vîdyoyê nîşan bide

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Hejmara daxwazên astengkirî di nîşaneyê de nîşan bide
